entry.title: Relax OP_RETURN standardness restrictions
entry.summary: A new tool has been developed to provide a solution for XORing your blocks directory without the necessity of resyncing. This innovative tool aims to streamline processes and enhance efficiency in managing block directories, addressing a common need within the Bitcoin development community. The tool is accessible through GitHub, allowing easy access and contribution from developers around the world. For those interested in utilizing or contributing to the development of this tool, it can be found at [blocks-xor on GitHub](https://github.com/andrewtoth/blocks-xor/). This development represents a significant contribution to the Bitcoin Development Mailing List group, underlining the ongoing efforts within the community to improve and refine the technological foundations of Bitcoin.
